title: HOLY UDYR!!!! Thank You Riot!!!!
body:
Looky at what Riot gifted my as my good behavior gift!!!

Love you Rito, forever and always 

[](http://i1379.photobucket.com/albums/ah124/mitchforx/spiritguardudyr_zpscc66e8f6.png)

replies.body: NICE!!! I was also gifted spirit guard udyr by a friend when mystery gifts first came out lol pretty awesome!!!!
I feel so stylish now
Everyone is getting great skins... and I'm just sitting here with Sun Goddess Karma (and I loathe Karma's rework)
I got traditional karma...I played her before her rework(didn't own her) and I wish that traditional karma actually had the old abilities before the rework ._.
Well, at least you've got something. I didn't get anything at all.
Git Gud

I got ragdoll poppy x3

It's rare, but y'know, it's a weird looking skin haha
Maybe you'll like it more once they finish her relaunch.

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AW75uaJW,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-01-11T04:15:24.205+0000)
>
> Maybe you'll like it more once they finish her relaunch.

Yeah, it'll be nice hopefully.
I got a Hyena Warwick. I've been Mystery gifted every Warwick skin. I don't play Warwick
I got mercenary Katarina. Satisfied.
Just put my Augmented Singed to shame boi! That's a sexy skin!

LOLOL, okay, I got a skin that was on sale....Tito please!!!!
I guess it was bligewater kat, which is a good skin, so I can't complain

I got red  yellow trimmed morde.
Dragonknight skin op!
i got mysterious tf or whatever that crappy skin is called D:
Well you are lucky. I got Sweeper Alistar. Woo hoo. A champ i never play. And you get this. Random
Nice! I got Demon Blade tryn

i got deep sea kog'
well, i guess i might use it if i don't feel like using battlecast sonaran or jurrasic kog'
congrats I got king trynd

..I got Marquis vladimir for my NA account and Jaximus for my Oceania account...
My sister got Dryad Soraka .__.
I got caterpillar kog. Not bad, as long as I'm in the mood to rek'face as a Caterpie.
RIOT I would also like to say thank you for the Dark Ryze you gave me but Im not gonna create a whole other post topic about it. But I like the concept of these gifts.

aww I didn't get one yet... Q.Q\

But, in riots track record im probably going to get a super awesome skin.. because well thats how cool they are?//
NICE! lololol wow , But look at my  new MoonNight/MidNight Shinobi Sivir  skin :3 SUPPORT ME >_
